name: Prohibited Hand Mortar of Bacam-Xum
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Barrel of Bacam-Xum" "246874" #L "Ignition chamber of Bacam-Xum" "246875" #L "Stock of Bacam-Xum" "246877" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Ignition chamber of Bacam-Xum + Barrel of Bacam-Xum = #L "Half-Finished Hand-Mortar of Bacam-Xum" "246876" Skills: | 1750WS,1250ME | ------------------------------ Stock of Bacam-Xum + Half-Finished Hand-Mortar of Bacam-Xum = #L "Prohibited Hand-Mortar of Bacam-Xum" "246873" Skills: | 1750WS,1250ME | ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ Extremely hard (if not impossible) to equip at level 205 without some seriously expensive buffing armor on. As if the Tradeskilling wasnt hard enough for this item.
